alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Parke; Vermillion; Warren (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 9:19PM EST until March 12 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana... Wabash River at Mount Carmel, Vincennes, Clinton, Riverton, Terre Haute, Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site, Montezuma, Covington. .Minor flooding is ongoing across western and southern Indiana. Flooding is expected to end early this weekend on the East Fork White, but persist on the lower White into early next week and lower Wabash through the middle of next week. Additional precipitation over the weekend is not expected to be enough to impact river levels. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Covington. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Five Crossings, a local county river park at old U.S. Highway 136 bridge site, begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EST Friday the stage was 17.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 PM EST Friday was 20.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 9.5 feet Monday, March 20. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
